definition.name: additional_device_settings
definition.description: Additional Settings

definition.name: user_info
definition.description: configures the user parameter in the REGISTER message

definition.name: cnf_join_enable
definition.description: when the conference bridge hangs up it should

definition.name: date_format
definition.description: the format to use for dates

value.name: date_format
value.description: the format to use for dates

definition.name: dst_auto_adjust
definition.description: enable DST automatic adjustment on phone

definition.name: dst_offset
definition.description: offset from the phone's time when DST is in effect

definition.name: dst_start_day
definition.description: day of the month on which DST begins.

value.name: dst_start_day
value.description: dst_start_day (Day of month to start DST)

definition.name: dst_start_day_of_week
definition.description: Day of the week on which DST begins.

value.name: dst_start_day_of_week
value.description: dst_start_day_of_week (Day of week to start DST)

definition.name: dst_start_month
definition.description: month in which DST starts

definition.name: dst_start_time
definition.description: time of day on which DST begins

definition.name: dst_start_week_of_month
definition.description: week of month in which DST begins

value.name: dst_start_week_of_month
value.description: dst_start_week_of_month (Week of month to start DST)

definition.name: dst_stop_day
definition.description: day of the month on which DST ends

value.name: dst_stop_day
value.description: dst_stop_day (Day of month to stop DST)

definition.name: dst_stop_day_of_week
definition.description: day of the week on which DST ends

value.name: dst_stop_day_of_week
value.description: dst_stop_day_of_week (Day of week to stop DST)

definition.name: dst_stop_month
definition.description: month in which DST ends

definition.name: dst_stop_time
definition.description: time of day on which DST ends

definition.name: dst_stop_week_of_month
definition.description: week of month in which DST ends

value.name: dst_stop_week_of_month
value.description: dst_stop_week_of_month (Week of month to stop DST)

definition.name: dtmf_avt_payload
definition.description: payload type for AVT packets

definition.name: dtmf_db_level
definition.description: in-band DTMF digit tone level

definition.name: dtmf_inband
definition.description: whether to detect and generate in-band signaling format

definition.name: dtmf_outofband
definition.description: whether to generate the out-of-band signaling and if so, when

definition.name: dyn_dns_addr_1
definition.description: IP address of a new dynamic DNS server

definition.name: dyn_dns_addr_2
definition.description: IP address of a second new dynamic DNS server

definition.name: dyn_tftp_addr
definition.description: specify the IP address of a new dynamic TFTP server

definition.name: enable_vad
definition.description: enable VAD

definition.name: end_media_port
definition.description: end RTP port range for media

definition.name: http_proxy_addr
definition.description: HTTP proxy server

definition.name: image_version
definition.description: firmware version

definition.name: logo_url
definition.description: location of the company logo file

definition.name: nat_address
definition.description: the WAN IP address of the Network Address Translation (NAT) or firewall server

value.name: nat_address
value.description: nat_address (NAT or firewall server WAN IP address)

definition.name: nat_enable
definition.description: enable NAT

definition.name: nat_received_processing
definition.description: enable NAT received processing

definition.name: network_media_type
definition.description: ethernet port negotiation mode

definition.name: network_port2_type
definition.description: device type that is connected to port 2 of the phone

definition.name: outbound_proxy
definition.description: Outbound proxy server

definition.name: phone_password
definition.description: password to be used for console or Telnet access

definition.name: phone_prompt
definition.description: prompt to be displayed when using Telnet or console access

definition.name: preferred_codec
definition.description: codec to use when initiating a call

value.name: preferred_codec
value.description: preferred_codec (Codec to use when initiating a call)

definition.name: proxy_backup
definition.description: Backup proxy server or gateway

definition.name: proxy_emergency
definition.description: Emergency proxy server or gateway

definition.name: proxy_register
definition.description: phone must register with a proxy server during initialization

definition.name: semi_attended_transfer
definition.description: transfer the second leg of an attended transfer while the call is ringing

definition.name: sip_invite_retx
definition.description: maximum number of times that an INVITE request will be retransmitted

definition.name: sip_retx
definition.description: maximum number of times a SIP message other than an INVITE request will be retransmitted

definition.name: sntp_mode
definition.description: mode in which the phone will listen for the SNTP server

definition.name: sntp_server
definition.description: IP address of the SNTP server

definition.name: start_media_port
definition.description: start RTP port range for media

definition.name: sync
definition.description: value against which to compare the value in the syncinfo.xml before performing a remote reboot

definition.name: telnet_level
definition.description: enable telnet

definition.name: tftp_cfg_dir
definition.description: TFTP subdirectory in which phone-specific configuration files are stored

value.name: tftp_cfg_dir
value.description: tftp_cfg_dir (TFTP subdirectory in which phone-specific configuration files are stored)

definition.name: time_format_24hr
definition.description: 12 or 24-hour time format displayed by default

definition.name: time_zone
definition.description: time zone in which the phone is located

definition.name: timer_invite_expires
definition.description: time (seconds), after which a SIP INVITE will expire

definition.name: timer_register_expires
definition.description: time (seconds), after which a REGISTRATION request will expire

definition.name: timer_t1
definition.description: lowest value (ms) of the retransmission timer for SIP messages

definition.name: timer_t2
definition.description: highest value (ms) of the retransmission timer for SIP messages

definition.name: tos_media
definition.description: Type of Service (ToS) level for the media stream being used

definition.name: voip_control_port
definition.description: UDP port used for SIP messages

definition.name: phone_label
definition.description: label to display on the top status line of the LCD

definition.name: dial_template
definition.description: dial_template (Path to dialplan template)
